rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual economic data ('will produce') without high-potency framing.
The segment uses a future verb ('will produce') with scale, but Q3 requires realised impact and excludes financial metrics.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports production projections but contains no explicit calming language.
